entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols kerberos authentication for ldapconnection in kubernetes #57901
    area-System.DirectoryServices, untriaged
  • Further reduce Linq usage in ComponentModel.Annotations #57897
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, untriaged
  • SocketException: An existing connection was forcibly closed by the remote host. .net core #57895
    area-System.Net, untriaged
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, runtime, .NET 7, validation-runtime-.NET 7 #runtime-103298-.NET7 #57892
    area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [API Proposal]: RegexOptions.Constrained #57891
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, api-ready-for-review, 7.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Hang when reading response data #57888
    area-System.Net.Http, untriaged
  • [API Proposal]: Add a GetDebuggerDisplay() to Object #57887
    api-suggestion, area-System.Runtime, untriaged

Closed

  • BadImageFormatException when trying to load c++/cli .net 5 assembly into c# .net 5 project #57642
    needs more info, area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • GCC build failure for JIT code #57861
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, untriaged
  • GZipStream Read() method will block forever even thougn base stream has already data written #57893
    untriaged
  • Runtime tests failing `The given key 'appContextSwitch' was not present in the dictionary.` #57886
    blocking-clean-ci, untriaged
  • Pass number of bytes to Buffer.BlockCopy #33765
    api-approved, area-System.Runtime, code-analyzer, 6.0.0

Updated

  • [mono][aot] `.aotdata` files size increase compared to _legacy_ mono #57689
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 7.0.0
  • Stack overflow and Consistency check failed: FAILED: m_crawl.pFrame->IsTransitionToNativeFrame() in System.Runtime.Tests #57807
    area-VM-coreclr, untriaged
  • Add support for reading, validating, and creating COSE_Sign/COSE_Sign1 messages #32121
    area-System.Security, Future
  • Task.Delay 100x slower on mono than coreclr on macOS #57877
    tenet-performance, untriaged, area-Threading-mono
  • System.Text.Json support to System.Runtime.Serialization #29975
    area-System.Text.Json, Future
  • Getting rid of ImmutableArray<T>.IsDefault ? #26829
    area-System.Collections, Future
  • Enum.ToString is slower than explicit implementation #57748
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, untriaged
  • [API Proposal]: Add method TryFormat for Enum #57881
    api-suggestion, area-System.Runtime, untriaged
  • Possible .NET optimization opportunities for an accumulated multiply-add loop #56855
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, optimization, Priority:2, 7.0.0
  • Logging Source Generator fails to compile due to CS8795 error with file-scoped namespaces #57880
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, .NET 6, validation-runtime-.NET 6, runtime #runtime-101520-.NET6 #57259
    area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, runtime, .NET 6 RC 1, validation-runtime-.NET 6 RC 1 #runtime-102558-.NET6RC1 #57711
    area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • User Story: .NET 7.0 developers can verify more APIs for correct usage to speed up their development #57797
    area-Meta, User Story, Priority:2, Cost:L, Bottom Up Work, Team:Libraries, 7.0.0
  • [HTTP/2] Race between reading response and reset? #57617
    bug, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.0
  • Http server performance regression in net6 preview 7 #57656
    area-System.Net.Http, needs more info, tenet-performance, untriaged

PullRequests

Created

  • [QW, Test] add more JitStress values. #57900
    NO REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Replace constant strings with SyntaxKind #57898
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Nullable annotation for System.Windows.Extensions #57896
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Handle file-scoped namespaces in Logging Source Generator #57894
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Remove stray #nullable disable from SkipLocalsInit.cs #57889

Merged

  • Skip RuntimeEventSource tests on wasm and android #57890
    auto-merge
  • [main] Update dependencies from dnceng/internal/dotnet-optimization dotnet/arcade #57878
  • Fix a few gcc warnings in jit #57744
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • Enable SocketHttpHandler to decompress zlib or deflate #57862
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.0
  • Fix VN incorrect optimizations with a new JitEEInterface function. #57282
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Add documentation to System.Net #57855
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Fix `StringSegment.Buffer` can be null #57858
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Primitives
  • Optimize division by constant after AND or RSZ #55778
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix PerfScore inconcistencies #56812
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Propagate BBF flags during hoisting #57825
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Improve morphing of comparisons #54204
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Add support for native relinking after Build, and AOT after publish #57556
    arch-wasm
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Add event to RuntimeEventSource for AppContext switches #57847

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-22
entry.content:

Updated

  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/arcade #19886

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cant debug source generator using roslyn component with certain dependencies. #55802
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Unused type parameters in local functions could be elided #55800
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • CS1712: false diagnostic for inheritdoc #55799
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, untriaged
  • Request: Small Roslyn changes to aid runtimes without UTF-16 strings #55798
    Area-Language Design, untriaged
  • Garbage base clause causes compiler crash #55797
    Bug, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Language services crashed when editing .NET Runtime project #55794
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Updated

  • Invert If refactoring is missing unit tests for Visual Basic #55677
    Area-IDE, Test, Concept-Continuous Improvement, 17.0
  • Visual Studio 2019 - account settings not working #55792
    untriaged
  • Visual Studio 2022 Changes Refactoring Order #55636
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Enable nullable reference types in Roslyn #39166
    Area-Infrastructure, Story, Concept-Null Annotations

PullRequests

Created

  • Split 'generate default constructor' in a codefix and coderefactoring #55801
    Area-IDE
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/source-build #55796
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix support for "Usings inside namespaces" in various places #55795
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #55793
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Switch to installing/uninstalling nuget packages in the BG instead of the UI thread #55671
    Area-IDE
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/arcade #55436
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use lambda expression and method group signature in type inference #55786
    Area-Compilers
  • Inline Hints: Option to suppress hints where the parameter name and argument name are the same #55781
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • VS2022 debuger crashes when reading HTTP Response Object response.Content.ReadAsStringAsync(); #35600
  • `IDataProtectionKeyContext.DataProtectionKeys` property should have `set` accessor #35599
  • SignalR client callback not firing in Blazor WebAssembly client IF client application was published AND callback parameter type has an Immutable collection property #35598
  • Uint8Array created by byte[] deserialization in javascript has incorrect buffer property byteLength #35597
  • Return the path in error handling #35596
  • Throws MessagePack.MessagePackSerializationException when simultaneously sending same message to multiple connected clients #35595
    area-signalr, Needs: Attention :wave:
  • Model binding fails with FormatException if dictionary key is numeric type and value is missing from POST #35594
  • Html.ActionLink() returns incorrect URL when Minimal Action with Name metadata in use #35592
  • Error in .NET 6 SDK when building a Blazor Wasm project that transitive referencing a Razor Class Library package built by .NET 5 SDK that contains static web assets #35590
  • Blazor Hosted WebAssembly, Failing to resolve the route. #35589

Updated

  • Blazor - BrotliCompress msbuild task duplicate processing of files - causes lock exceptions #29529
    bug, Needs: Author Feedback, area-blazor, blazor-wasm, Status: No Recent Activity, affected-few, severity-major, feature-razor-sdk, 6.0-rc2
  • ASP.NET Core *. StaticWebAssets.xml get unexpectedly deleted in the dependent project's output directory on build #35345
    Needs: Author Feedback, area-mvc, Status: No Recent Activity, Author: Migration Bot :robot:, feature-static-web-assets, 6.0-rc2
  • [SignalR] IUserIdProvider's GetUserId has no async option #35417
    Needs: Author Feedback, area-signalr, Status: No Recent Activity
  • ConnectionState.getNextInvocationId() on a null object reference #35444
    Needs: Author Feedback, area-signalr, Status: No Recent Activity
  • Web.config transformations not working when deploying Blazor WebAssembly application to Production and Staging Environments #35584
  • hotreload breaks blazor webassembly with asp and user defined base path - missing blazor-hotreload.js returns 404 #35555
    Author: Migration Bot :robot:
  • dev-certificates on Linux -- how to get dotnet-to-dotnet comms to work? #7246
    enhancement, area-commandlinetools, feature-devcerts, severity-major, affected-medium, Backlog
  • Subclassing Startup from StartupBase throws NotSupportedException #35502
    Docs, area-runtime, feature-hosting
  • [SignalR] Provide a way for Azure SignalR to read HttpConnectionDispatcherOptions #35544
    area-signalr
  • VS 2022 Preview 3.1 Template creates Minimal API for Blazor Server Hosted Project #35577
    area-runtime
  • Analyzers for Minimal APIs #35528
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from dotnet/efcore #35593
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • [SPA] Ensure spawned NPM processes are terminated when the dotnet process is ungracefully terminated #35591
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Complain when returning IActionResult from MinimalAction #35572
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • [release/6.0-rc1] Add support for Results extension point #35574
    area-runtime
  • Add support for Results extension point #35571
    area-runtime
  • Merge from 'release/6.0-rc1' into 'release/6.0' #35588
  • [release/3.1] Expose all references when not restoring #33197
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.20
  • RC1 Port: Add FailureReasons (#35425) #35529
    area-security, ask-mode
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime dotnet/efcore #35547
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Update Components to use LoggerMessage #35585
    area-blazor

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • BlazorWebView drag and drop does not work with MAUI Templates #2205
  • [Bug] ICommandMapper and IPropertyMapper usage is very inconsistent #2204
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • WebView needs Width and Height for Filling screen #2203
  • [Bug] Setting ScrollbarVisibility in ScrollView is not working #2202
  • [Bug] Typing in an entry sets the cursor position to 0 after each character #2201
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • [Bug] [Android] Empty or Null HTML Label throws exception #2199

Closed

  • Status of window-level menus and toolbars (for desktop apps) #2151
  • Where is the RelativeLayout? #2147

Updated

  • [Bug] Blazor Maui App not resizing with change of window size #1730
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [Bug] BackgroundColor is not applied if changed using a binding or in code at runtime #1854
    t/bug
  • [Bug] BackgroundColor doesn't update when applied to Page #2152
    partner, partner/ui-tools, 6.0.100-rc.1
  • Button not rendered correctly #1941
    t/bug
  • [Bug] Adding views in HR does not respect index and appends #2198
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • [Bug] [HotReload] Removing all or the last view in a layout does not refresh the tree #2196
    partner/ui-tools, 6.0.100-rc.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix some Layout update bugs #2200
    6.0.100-rc.1

Updated

  • [main] Update dependencies from xamarin/xamarin-macios #2184
  • [main] Update dependencies from xamarin/xamarin-android #2183

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Scaffolding doesn't generate default values #25654
    customer-reported
  • Exploring Scoped vs Transactional (`IDbContextFactory`) `DbContexts` #25653
    customer-reported
  • Recursive Hierarchy in self referenced table - ef core 5 #25649
    customer-reported

Closed

  • HasDefaultValue(constant) #25648
    closed-question, customer-reported
  • Issues with builder.HasKey() #25650
    closed-question, customer-reported

Updated

  • Allow [NotParameterized] to work for query filters #25630
    type-enhancement, customer-reported
  • Allow FKs to exist in the model but avoid creating them in the database #15854
    type-enhancement, customer-reported, area-migrations, Backlog
  • Set TPH discriminator value correctly when discriminator is part of the primary key #21206
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-change-tracking, 6.0.0
  • Detect unknown shadow primary key values when attempting to save owned collection #19856
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-model-building, area-change-tracking, punted-for-5.0, 6.0.0
  • "Possible null reference return" in auto-generated compiled model #25647
    customer-reported

PullRequests

Created

  • Detect unknown shadow primary key values when attempting to save owned collection #25652
  • Fix Cosmos update exception wrapping #25651
